companies_top_card_text: Browse the profiles of participating companies

abonnement_legal_text_1: When purchasing a Basic or Premium subscription, an initial monthly amount will be debited from your iTunes account at the price of the subscription you have selected.
abonnement_legal_text_2: The monthly amount is in the versions:
abonnement_legal_text_4: Subscriptions automatically renew if they are not canceled within 24 hours of the end of the current period.
abonnement_legal_text_5: You can cancel at any time in your iTunes account settings.
abonnement_legal_text_6: Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
abonnement_legal_text_7_a: You can find more information in our
abonnement_version_basic_point_a_p: Then € 1.09 for two pipeline PLUS contributions

blog_category_top_card_subtitle: Manage your blog category in pipeline
blog_category_top_card_text: Here you can determine how your category and posts in your category should be dealt with. By configuring the priority, you can also control how important posts in this category are to your readers.
collection_picker_intro_text: You can create your own folders so that users can find the posts on your profile more easily.

connections_card_intro_text: With connections, content from various platforms can be automatically integrated.

creators_regional_settings_text: Determine in which language you write articles and in which regions they should appear
creators_shop_admin_headline: Link your online shop with pipeline
creators_shop_admin_text: You can connect your online shop to pipeline so that newly published products in your online shop are automatically submitted to pipeline for review and can be managed in the shop admin.
daily_admin_customers_notification_0: So far today $ count have registered new users. Let's invite $ left people to reach $ nextGoal users!
daily_admin_customers_notification_1: $ count new users today! Can we still invite $ left people so that we can reach $ nextGoal users?
daily_admin_customers_notification_2: So far, $ count new users today. Another $ left people, and we have $ nextGoal users!
daily_blog_admin_notification_0: Please remember to accept at least 10 entries today
daily_blog_admin_notification_1: Go $ firstname! Can you make 15 posts today?
daily_blog_admin_notification_2: $ firstname, we need your support! Please accept a few more articles
daily_blog_admin_notification_3: Do you have a few minutes? 2-3 articles already help
daily_blog_admin_notification_4: Your posts already added today, $ firstname?
discover_people_text: Your personal feed is currently being created! Use the time to follow popular authors or connect with your contacts.

feature_requires_abo_premium: This feature requires the premium subscription
feed_top_card_text: Here you can find posts based on your interests.
feedback_description: Tell us how satisfied you are

forgot_password_text_b: We will send you an e-mail with a link to your registered e-mail address with which you can create a new password.
free_month_basic: Use the basic subscription free of charge for one month
free_month_premium: Use the premium subscription for free for one month
groups_top_card_text: In groups, users can share content with each other and follow topics
home_top_card_text: On your homepage you will find articles that are recommended to you.
home_view_description: Determine how you want the posts to be displayed
inbox_top_card_text: Notifications and messages from friends appear in the inbox
interests_description: Choose what you want to see
interests_top_card_text: Here you can specify which topics interest you.
intro_1: Welcome to your own magazine! If you want, we will briefly introduce you to the features.
intro_2: On the Homepage you will find posts that share your interests.
intro_3: You can use the search function to search your entire magazine, even if individual articles are no longer suggested to you.
intro_4: You can always access the main menu ...
intro_discover_1: Are you looking for exciting new content? "Discover" presents you with content that could offer you something new.
intro_finished: That's it! Have fun with pipeline!
intro_home_1: Welcome to pipeline! Based on your reading behavior and your information, we will create your personal magazine in the next few days.
intro_home_2: You can interact with posts by sharing them, adding them to your profile or rating them.
intro_local_1: With pipeline you can also discover local content.
intro_local_2: Select a region to discover regional content from bloggers and editors in your area
intro_people_1: Here you can find currently popular profiles that you can follow.
intro_people_2: By following profiles, your magazine will be expanded to include the user's content.
intro_profile_1: Welcome to your profile! Here you can present users with personal information as well as articles, products and galleries that you find interesting
intro_profile_2: When you save a post, it will be displayed here
intro_slider_slide_1_p: Pipeline presents you with new articles, products and people every day - uniquely tailored to you and individualized.
intro_slider_slide_2_p: Each individual contribution is individually adapted to your reading habits in terms of text length, complexity and the preferred formats.
intro_slider_slide_3_p: In pipeline, only YOU decide what you want to see. Choose your favorite topics and determine how much you are interested in them. We take care of the rest!
intro_slider_slide_4_p: Activate push notifications and receive news and updates on topics that interest you
intro_slider_slide_5_p: App tracking makes the pipeline better, your magazine even more individual, content more tailored and advertising more personalized.
invisible_subtitle: Friends and other people can only find you if you follow them first
invitation_redeem_success_text: Nice to see you at pipeline!
invite_friends_text: Connect with your friends and find even more exciting content that interests you

login_legal_info: By registering, you agree to our $1 and $2.

prompt_beta_test_submitted_message: Thank you for helping us make pipeline better! If you notice any errors, we would be happy if you let us know using the feedback function.

verified_info_text_2: So you can be sure that the person behind the profile is not a fake.
verified_info_text_3: Verified users are all manually checked and confirmed by pipeline.
